name: Attack of the Rotters
description:
Art done by me

coding and music by other classmates

This is classic zombie shooter arcade game but for the nintendo DS. The only goal is to survive the many waves of Zombies. You use the arrow keys to aim and Ctrl to shoot. You will also use your mouse to select the start, pause and shop buttons. You will also use the mouse to select any new guns you might want. The more zombies you kill the more money you get to buy ammo and guns.
